vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βλαστός, ὁ,
shoot, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; bud, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; embryo, germ, [Refs]; ὁ τοῦ β. καιρός, i. e. Spring, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__2 blossom, β. κρίνου [LXX]
__II offsprmg, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.12.20
§ Blastus, "sprout [of a vine or branch]"
Blastus, (Proper name), Acts 12:20*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
伯拉斯都 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "萌芽"
希律亞基帕一世的侍從 (徒 12:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
伯拉斯都 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "萌芽"
希律亚基帕一世的侍从 (徒 12:20)
